author: Asad Hashim
title: Pakistani doctors decry lack of supplies as lockdown debate rages
description: Doctors raise alert over personal protection equipment shortage, as Taftan quarantine camp remains at centre of spread.
content: Islamabad, Pakistan - Authorities in Pakistan continue to debate whether to enforce a widescale lockdown to control the accelerating spread of coronavirus cases across the country, as cases hit more than 800 and doctors complain of dwindling personal protecti… [+6319 chars]
